meanings.definition: To smile in a smug or self-satisfied way.
meanings.sent1: She was smerking after winning the game.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys smerking whenever he gets his way.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a little smerk after catching the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The villain smerked as his evil plan unfolded perfectly.
meanings.sent5: Her smerking face showed she was up to something mischievous.

meanings.definition: The act of smiling in a smug or self-satisfied way.
meanings.sent1: His smerking was evident when he received praise.
meanings.sent2: The teacher noticed her student's smerking during the test.
meanings.sent3: The painting of the king had a mysterious smerking expression.
meanings.sent4: The politician's smerking in the debate was unsettling.
meanings.sent5: The child's smerking made it clear he had eaten the cookies.
